doc.title: Microsoft Teams

application.doc: Microsoft Teams enables you to get all your content, tools and conversations in the Team workspace with Office 365.

doc.title: List teams This operation retrieves a list of all the Teams (Office 365 Groups) you are a member of.
Add Team ID
List channels This operation retrieves a list of all the channels for a specific Team.
Add Team ID
Create a channel This operation is used to create a new channel for a specific Team.
Add Team ID
Add Teams channel ID
Post a message (V2) This operation is used to post a message to a channel in a specific Team.

Add Teams channel ID
Get messages This operation is used to get messages from a channel in a specific Team.

Post a message This operation is used to post a message to a channel in a specific Team.
Post a message as the Flow bot to a user Easily automate the process of sending a message to someone in Teams.
Post a message as the Flow bot to a channel Easily automate the process of posting a message to a Teams channel.
Add Team ID
Post your own adaptive card as the Flow bot to a user Add the JSON card definition to create a custom message for a Teams user. The message can contain images, graphs, text, and more.
Post your own adaptive card as the Flow bot to a channel Add the JSON card definition to create a custom post for a Teams channel. The post can contain images, graphs, text, and more.
Add Team ID
Type of the recipient of the action
Get adptive card input metadata Get the schema information for adaptive card inputs
Type of the recipient of the action
Get notification input metadata Get the schema information for notification inputs
Post a choice of options as the Flow bot to a user Easily automate the process of sending a message to a Teams user that contains a set of options they must choose from before they respond.
Post an Adaptive Card to a Teams user and wait for a response Easily automate the process of sending a message to a Teams user that contains actions to continue a waiting flow.
Post an Adaptive Card to a Teams channel and wait for a response Easily automate the process of sending a message to a Teams channel that contains actions to continue a waiting flow.
